Posts.Content: Apr 16, 2011 10:05AM lfox wrote: Hello, I am warmly reading these posts. I am a Hodgkin's survivor from 1980, age 23, having had cobalt (no longer used) mantle field RT. I am two weeks post bilat. M with expanders for IDC, node negative. I had a bone scan that showed osteopenia so I am concerned about possible chemo, there is no decision yet. I am so grateful to all your posts and I will continue to lend an ear and support.
Posts.Title: Hodgkin's Survivors/Secondary Breast Cancer lifelover Proog2
